TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ContentPresenter extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 显示 的内容。

span.span: Displays the content of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用的中的来指定要添加内容的位置。You typically use the in the of a to specify where the content is to be added. 每个类型的默认值均为。Every type has a in its default . 当对象位于的中时, 、和属性将从相同名称的属性中获取其值。 When a object is in a of a , the , , and properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the . 可以让属性通过设置属性或绑定到模板父级的其他属性来获取这些属性的值。You can have the property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the property or binding to them. 使用以下逻辑显示: The uses the following logic to display the : - 如果设置了的 属性, 则会将其应用到属性,并将显示结果及其子元素(如果有)。 If the property on the is set, the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. 有关对象的详细信息, 请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). - 如果设置了的属性, 则会向属性应用合适的, 并且会显示结果及其子元素 (如果有)。 If the property on the is set, the applies the appropriate to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果有与类型关联的, 则会将其应用到属性,并将显示生成的及其子元素(如果有)。If there is a associated with the type of , the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果是一个对象, 则显示。If is a object, the is displayed. 如果已经有父级, 则会出现异常。If the already has a parent, an exception occurs. - 如果有一个将类型转换为的, 则将使用并显示结果 。If there is a that converts the type of to a , the uses that and the resulting is displayed. - 如果有一个将 类型转换为字符串的, 则将使用并创建一个来包含该字符串。If there is a that converts the type of to a string, the uses that and creates a to contain that string. 此时将显示。The is displayed. - 如果内容为, 则 属性的值将显示在中。If the content is an , the value of the property is displayed in a . - 对调用方法,并创建以包含由返回的字符串。 The calls the method on the and creates a to contain the string returned by . 此时将显示。The is displayed. ## Examples 下面演示 了 用于设置的的。The following shows a that sets the of a . 定义在元素中 显示为。 The defines that the appears as an within a element. 应在内垂直和水平居中显示和的标记。 The marks that the of the should be displayed and centered vertically and horizontally within the . [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)] 下图显示了应用此应用时的的外观:The following image shows the appearance of the when this gets applied: ![按钮 system.windows.controls.controltemplate> 示例](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "按钮 system.windows.controls.controltemplate> 示例")![Button ControlTemplate sample](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "Button ControlTemplate sample")

span.span: This may depend on the content or other properties.
The to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类实现以下规则:The base class implements the following rules: 1. 如果设置了, 请使用它。If is set, use it. 2. 如果设置了, 则调用其方法。If is set, call its method. 如果结果不`null`为, 请使用它。If the result is not `null`, use it. 3. 查找与已知的资源 (包括应用程序、主题和系统资源) 之间的内容相匹配的。 Look for a whose matches the content among the resources known to the (including application, theme, and system resources). 如果找到一个, 请使用它。If one is found, use it. 4. 如果的类型是 "common", 请使用标准模板。If the type of is "common", use a standard template. 常见类型为`String`、 和。The common types are `String`, , and . 5. 否则, 请使用本质上转换为字符串的默认模板并将其显示在中。Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts to a string and displays it in a . 派生类可以重写这些规则并实现其自己的规则。Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你 在的中放置时, 它会自动显示模板化控件的。 When you place a in the of a , it automatically displays the of the templated control. 这意味着, 如果将的设置为, 则的属性将隐式绑定到 使用该的的。This means that if you set the of your to be , the property of the is implicitly bound to the of the that is using that . 若要为属性设置绑定, 你可能需要考虑使用属性。To set up bindings for the properties, you may want to consider using the property. 属性指向模板父节点上的属性, 并自动为关联模板和模板选择器属性使用别名。The property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 通常, 使用`TemplateBinding`将此属性值绑定到模板化控件上的某个值。Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control. 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息, 请参阅[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

The default is "Content".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当在模板中时 , 才应使用此属性。This property should only be used when the is in a template. 如果模板包含 设置 `Abc`为 "`Abc`" 的, 则的`AbcTemplate`、和属性将自动化名为、和。 `AbcTemplateSelector`。When a template contains a with set to "`Abc`", the , , and properties of the are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively. `Abc` `AbcStringFormat`从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], 将设置为 "" 还会使属性化名为。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting to "`Abc`" also causes the property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`. 此属性最有用的两个值为 "内容" 和 "标头"。The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header". ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个样式, 该样式演示属性的用法:The following example shows a style for a that demonstrates the usage of the property: [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义的复合字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息, 请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果设置了 或的属性,则将忽略属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
